nodes.documentation:
@title Blacklistable Token
@dev Allows accounts to be blacklisted by a "blacklister" role
nodes.name: Blacklistable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the blacklister
nodes.name: onlyBlacklister

nodes.documentation:
@dev Throws if argument account is blacklisted
@param _account The address to check
nodes.name: notBlacklisted

nodes.documentation:
@dev Checks if account is blacklisted
@param _account The address to check
nodes.name: isBlacklisted

nodes.documentation:
@dev Adds account to blacklist
@param _account The address to blacklist
nodes.name: blacklist

nodes.documentation:
@dev Removes account from blacklist
@param _account The address to remove from the blacklist
nodes.name: unBlacklist
